name: Record Run
description:
From the makers of ROCK BAND and DANCE CENTRAL…This is RECORD RUN!

Record Run is a free rhythm-runner that puts you in the middle of your music, chasing records and dodging obstacles to the beat in a crazy musical world. With gameplay levels created to play along with your music, this is a whole new way to run!

“Harmonix has managed to transfer the desire for perfection that made Guitar Hero so compulsive into an endless runner.” –Pocket Gamer

Choose your runner from a fun cast of characters and jump, duck and dodge through the city on your way to high-scores! Collect records as you run to get awesome upgrades and unlocks!

(Note: RECORD RUN REQUIRES SONGS TO BE STORED LOCALLY ON YOUR DEVICE. Songs stored in the cloud must be downloaded to your device to be used. )

Record Run features an amazing hand-painted art style, characters with tons of personality, and moment-to-moment gameplay that’s deeply musical and crazy fun. Users select songs from the music library on their device and run through levels along with their music that are created on the spot by all new Harmonix magic. Unlock content and currency through a series of exciting “missions” that track your progress and transform the city into an amazing “Groove World."

Record Run also allows users to challenge their friends to song battles, fight it out on weekly leaderboards and much, much more!

***Note: iPod Touch 4G is not supported.
*** Record Run does not currently support streaming music services.
*** Record Run currently supports most audio formats, but is incompatible with DRM-locked “.m4p” format, previously sold in the iTunes Music Store.
